features.name: Client Authentication
features.description: Customer login/logout using real backend via /api/auth/login; persists JWT and tenant slug; handles refresh token via /api/auth/refresh.

features.name: Cart Management
features.description: Global shopping cart context with fetch/add/update/remove/clear and toast feedback.

features.name: Product Catalog (Storefront)
features.description: Storefront product listing and add-to-cart flow using ProductCard.

features.name: Checkout
features.description: Checkout page and cart summary; integrates with cart and (planned) Stripe subscription.

features.name: HTTP Client & Interceptors
features.description: Axios client with Authorization and X-Tenant-Slug headers; auto-refresh on 401; mock session handling.

features.name: Mock Backend (Dev/Test)
features.description: Express server exposing /api endpoints for auth, products, cart, orders, coupons, etc.

features.name: Test Plans (Testsprite)
features.description: Frontend E2E test plan covering auth, cart, checkout and admin flows.

features.name: Build & Preview Config
features.description: Vite configuration and NPM scripts for dev, build, and preview.

features.name: Deployment & Docs
features.description: Technical and deployment documentation for the project and integration guidance.
